headline: Beautiful place to work but not for any long period of time
pros: Make friends with Co workers, beautiful community, access to facilities, learning opportunities
cons: No benefits, no overtime, petty office drama, high employee turnover, your told that you're easily replaceable

headline: Assistant
pros: Great support from coworkers, generous benefits, small office.
cons: few promotion opportunities in lower level positions.

headline: More interested in the bottom line and not how well the employees perform.‚Äù
cons: Benefits are OK. Does not justify about of work. Employees hired a years ago received a higher starting pay; salary rose, then lowered again and again. Hard to get bonus pay...compensation is not on performance based. Lots of turn around.
